word:
MR No. 1276 - Edson White and W. O. Palmer Not to Act Independently of the Conference in Establishing a Health Food Business

     (Written January 27, 1902, from "Elmshaven," St. Helena, California, to Elder and Mrs. W. O. Palmer.) 


     I wish to write you a few words. I am still weak, but my trust is in the Lord, and I shall not worry. I have written a letter to Edson, and have another nearly finished, but it has disappeared. I have looked for it, but cannot find it.
